instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: MacbookPro A2251 820-01949-07  No Internal and External display
threads.message:
Hi
Got an 2020 macbook with no display. checked with external display but no luck.
there is a usb activity, i can see led light in a usb mouse. No Caps lock light.

CPU getting warm and stucked at 200mAmp. Some time goes to 950mAmp when startup but return back and stayes at 200mAMP

PLT_RST_L -1.8V
PM-RSMRST_L- 3.3V
PM_SYSRST_L- 3.3 V
PPVCCIN_S0_CPU- 1.6V
VCCST_PWRGD- 1V
PM_PCH_SYS_PWROK- 3.3V
PM_PCH_PWROK- 3.3V
PM_PCH_DPWROK-3.3V
PPVCCIN_AUX_PCH_PRIM- 1.8 V

No idea where i can start for. looks like it is not booting properly.

threads.title: MacbookPro A2251 820-01949-07  No Internal and External display
threads.message:
Steady light on mouse is not a sign for USB activity.
You should know that; was already explained on the forum.
[URL unfurl="true"]https://boards.rossmanngroup.com/threads/how-to-collection.60974/[/URL]

Did you try DFU?
